Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory335.png'}
{3: "The battle's over, the enemies are gone, but that Red Tide's still creeping in."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory523.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory523.jpg'}
{3: "Countdown hits zero, and everything's swallowed by that nasty red, dragged into a pit of despair."}
{1: '1', 3: 'Jetavie keels over out of nowhere, her tiny frame cradled in your arms.'}
{3: 'Her once-beautiful face, now marked with crimson lines, fractures like shattered glass.'}
{3: 'They were probably caused by an earlier arrow hit she never let on about.'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'I must look like a real mess now, right? Always ending up like this.', 4: '1'}
{2: "No, Jetavie, you're perfect.", 3: '20'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "You're still just as sweet as always... every single time. Kind of annoying, to be honest.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "But, uh, sorry, Chosen One, it's another swing and a miss.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'No time to set up a quarantine zone, and whipping up a simulated vaccine is unlikely...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'The virus has pretty much taken over everything, spreading like wildfire through the system.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Virus... Jetavie, what are you talking about?', 3: '25'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'The thing that wrecks this whole world.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Some beast that busted through the firewall like it was nothing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Even if the defense systems hold up, trying to patch things up? Pointless.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'No time for explanations now...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Like I said, when that countdown hits zero, it's game over for the world.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Without that crucial item, we're stuck in this confined space.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Access Key.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Suddenly, a headache hits you, and a sense of deja vu flits through your mind.'}
{3: '<color=#ff0e0e>The key</color>, vital for you, the ticket out of here...'}
{3: "In past futile attempts, you and Jetavie missed it by a hair's breadth."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Ringing a bell for you now?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Jetavie starts to stiffen up, struggling to reach out and touch your face.'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Hapless bubbles, hmph.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "I'm about to fade away like bubbles along with the end of everything.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Even though it's been a beautiful, fleeting ride, we shared some solid moments, didn't we?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Scenes played out over and over, yet never lost their shine, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Look at me, chatting away to myself again. Bit loopy, am I?', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's alright, Jetavie.", 3: '49'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Like I've said, Chosen One, the game's not over yet.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Maybe next time, we'll run a bit faster, reach a bit farther.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'When you cross paths with the next Jetavie, try not to be so soft on her.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Otherwise, you'll end up right back in this mawkish mess.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Really now...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Jetavie lets go of your hand, slowly placing it over her chest.'}
{3: 'Streams of red light burst out from the cracks in her chest like fireworks.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFallNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Jetavie spreads her arms, hovering lightly in mid-air, offering a hug to this wild world.'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Calling upon all the computing power to rewrite the main system from the inside out.', 4: '1'}
{1: '[Warning, unauthorized internal activity detected]', 3: '60', 4: 'e60000'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Use my body as the key to open the link once more!', 4: '1'}
{1: '[Intruder has breached the central core]', 3: '60', 4: 'e60000'}
{1: '[Attempting clearance demotion... Demotion failed]', 3: '60', 4: 'e60000'}
{1: '[Override detected, initiating destruction protocol]', 3: '60', 4: 'e60000'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Now, force start the restoration program!', 4: '1'}
{1: '[System... Restoration preparation complete]', 3: '60', 4: '34aff8ff'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Farewell, Chosen One.', 4: '1'}
{1: '[Restoration program initiated]', 3: '60', 4: '34aff8ff'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxTongyong/FxUiGuanbixiaoshi.prefab', 2: '2', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFallNew.prefab'}
{3: 'As Jetavie bids farewell, her figure fades away in a dazzling light.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory764.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '0.6', 5: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'At the edge of the sky, a dark curtain begins to unfurl, shrouding everything in its path.'}
{3: 'The shadowy mass spreads in every direction, its tendrils reaching out to engulf the Red Tide and swallow it into oblivion.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: "In the blink of an eye, the world crumbles, and you're swallowed by that bleak darkness."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'Suddenly, you find yourself back in the familiar Sea of Darkness, hearing echoes from one shore while glimpsing flickering lights from the other.'}
{3: 'As your memories wane and your existence fades, you stumble upon a cradle wrapped in emptiness.'}
{3: 'The entity within stirs, signaling new possibilities on the horizon.'}
{3: "Before your life melds with another's, you still hold a deep fondness for this world."}
{3: 'With gentle words, you reassure this embryonic potential...'}
{2: 'Ready to embark on the journey? Alongside that girl.', 3: '106'}
{2: "You'll edge closer to the truth and pay the price, but not before...", 3: '107'}
{2: 'Remember the purpose of the journey.', 3: '108'}
{2: 'Choose.'}
